testcase.name: GameBoard Component > should render canvas with correct dimensions
GameBoard Component > should render game over overlay when gameOver is true
NextPiece Component > should render next piece canvas
NextPiece Component > should handle null nextPiece
Tetris Logic > createEmptyBoard > should create a board with correct dimensions
Tetris Logic > createEmptyBoard > should create empty cells
Tetris Logic > getRandomTetromino > should return a valid tetromino
Tetris Logic > rotateTetromino > should rotate I piece correctly
Tetris Logic > rotateTetromino > should rotate O piece (no change)
Tetris Logic > checkCollision > should detect wall collision
Tetris Logic > checkCollision > should detect floor collision
Tetris Logic > checkCollision > should detect piece collision
Tetris Logic > checkCollision > should not detect collision when clear
Tetris Logic > mergeTetromino > should merge tetromino into board
Tetris Logic > clearLines > should clear full lines
Tetris Logic > clearLines > should not clear partial lines
Tetris Logic > calculateScore > should calculate score correctly
Tetris Logic > calculateLevel > should calculate level correctly
Tetris Logic > getDropSpeed > should calculate drop speed correctly
